Skill Description: Ability to express ideas, request actions, formulate plans, & policies by means of clear and effective verbal communications.
Skill Level Description: Uses clear and effective elementary verbal communications skills under supervision to express ideas, request actions and formulate plans or policies.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to understand and effectively use standard office equipment and standard software packages to support business processes.
Skill Level Description: Supports business processes under supervision by applying an elementary understanding and effective use of standard office equipment and standard software packages.

Skill Description: Ability to plan, organize, prioritize and oversee activities to efficiently meet objectives.
Skill Level Description: Works with guidance (but not constant supervision) to plan, organize, prioritize and oversee activities to efficiently meet business objectives.

Skill Description: The ability to review and evaluate recommendations and requirements and to develop appropriate plans or deliver actions required.
Skill Level Description: Works with guidance (but not constant supervision) to develop appropriate plans or perform necessary actions based on recommendations and requirements.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to monitor, interpret and understand policies and procedures and ensure their alignment with organizational strategies and work objectives.
Skill Level Description: Works with guidance (but not constant supervision) to develop, monitor, interpret and understand policies and procedures, while making sure they match organizational strategies and objectives.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to understand numerical concepts and use them to carry out mathematical operations e.g. in order to analyze reports.
Skill Level Description: Uses an elementary understanding of numerical concepts to perform mathematical operations such as report analysis under supervision.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to select and deploy the appropriate office system and to use it to optimum effect.
Skill Level Description: Works at an elementary level under supervision to select, deploy and get the best results from the most appropriate office system.

Skill Description: Ability to express ideas, request actions, formulate plans, & policies by means of clear and effective verbal communications.
Skill Level Description: Uses clear and effective verbal communications skills without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on expressing ideas, requesting actions and formulating plans or policies.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to ensure that people at all levels in the organization possess and develop the skills knowledge and experiences needed to fulfill the short and long term ambitions of the organization and that they are motivated to learn, grow and develop.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on motivating all employees to learn, grow and develop so that they can obtain the knowledge and experience they need to help the organization reach its goals.

Skill Description: Ability to plan, organize, prioritize and oversee activities to efficiently meet objectives.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on planning, organizing, prioritizing and overseeing activities to efficiently meet business objectives.

Skill Description: The ability to review and evaluate recommendations and requirements and to develop appropriate plans or deliver actions required.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on developing appropriate plans or performing necessary actions based on recommendations and requirements.

Skill Description: Ability to plan, organize, control, and lead activities that ensure compliance with relevant laws and standards.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on achieving full compliance with applicable rules and regulations in management and/or operations.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to determine and analyze trends from data that is collected to assist in compiling reports that will help in decision-making.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on analyzing data trends for use in reports to help guide decision making.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to monitor, interpret and understand policies and procedures and ensure their alignment with organizational strategies and work objectives.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on developing, monitoring, interpreting and understanding policies and procedures, while making sure they match organizational strategies and objectives.

Skill Description: The ability to communicate and deliver information verbally in a clear, concise and compelling manner to other people.
Skill Level Description: Communicates with other people without requiring supervision and provides technical guidance when required on speaking in a clear, concise and compelling manner.

Skill Description: The ability to assimilate and understand data and information from various sources in order to draw appropriate conclusions and make relevant recommendations.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on analyzing data from multiple sources to draw appropriate conclusions and make suitable recommendations.

Skill Description: Ability and skill to acquire, organize, protect and process data in order to fulfill business objectives.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on acquiring, organizing, protecting and processing data to fulfill business objectives.

Skill Description: Ability to assess process performance and recommend improvements.
Skill Level Description: Works with full competence to assess process performance and recommend improvements. Typically works without supervision and may provide technical guidance.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to plan and manage small project work assignments within desired cost, time and quality parameters.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision while providing technical guidance when required on managing projects and/or programs within desired cost, time and quality parameters.

Skill Description: The ability and skill to create reports for various audiences as relevant, in a lucid and effective manner, keeping in mind the purpose of reports.
Skill Level Description: Works without supervision and provides technical guidance when required on creating relevant, lucid and effective reports.

Skill Description: Ability and skill to remove constraints and blockers, and share power by putting the needs of the employees first and help people develop and perform as highly as possible.
Skill Level Description: Works with full competence to remove constraints and blockers, and share power by putting the needs of the employees first and help people develop and perform as highly as possible.  Typically works without supervision and may provide technical guidance.
